effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
